boat.name: Ruffler
boat.full_description: Hull professionally repainted 2019 and mast stripped and given 12 coats of varnish. She has a new cover, topsail, storm jib and a sobstad spinnaker Wykeham Martin Furler. Saildrive mariner engine on transon, just serviced. Bramber road trailer has also been serviced. Much admired boat kept at Hayling Island Sailing Club. Lifting hatch and very good bunk cushions in cabin.

for_sales.sales_text:
'Ruffler' reduced to Â£7950. Memory 19. Gregs number 2 open  boat. Exhibited at SBS 2000 and 2001

Present home 15 years, 5 HP saildrive Mariner on transom. Hull professionally re-painter this season and mast stripped and given 12 coats of varnish. Also new cover. Wykeham Martin furler. Topsail, storm jib and Sobastad spinnaker. Price includes a Bramber road trailer.

A much admired boat at a very fair price. Receipts for just about everything. She is on a deep water mooring at HISC. Age and health forces me to 'slum it' in my Marina berthed Benateau Oceanis 31 instead.
